text: Wang Xiaobo (; pinyin: Wáng Xiǎobō; May 13, 1952 – April 11, 1997) was a famous writer in mainland China. His most famous book is called Golden Time. It was published in 1994. Wang was born in Beijing, China. In 1972, he became a teacher in the Shandong province. In 1978, he started studying at the Renmin University of China. ==Related pages== *List of Chinese writers ==References== Category:1952 births Category:1997 deaths Category:20th-century Chinese writers
title: Wang Xiaobo
